snippets.text:
{{set policy-options policy-statement <<CUSTOMER>>:AS<<REMOTEASN>> term ACCEPT-CUST-ROUTES from as-path <<CUSTOMER>>:AS<<REMOTEASN>>
}}

{{set policy-options policy-statement <<CUSTOMER>>:AS<<REMOTEASN>> term ACCEPT-CUST-ROUTES from prefix-list-filter <<CUSTOMER>>:AS<<REMOTEASN>> orlonger
}}

{{set policy-options policy-statement <<CUSTOMER>>:AS<<REMOTEASN>> term ACCEPT-CUST-ROUTES then next policy
}}

{{set policy-options policy-statement <<CUSTOMER>>:AS<<REMOTEASN>> term ACCEPT-CUT-ROUTES from prefix-list-filter <<CUSTOMER>>:AS<<REMOTEASN>> orlonger
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> description "BGP Customer <<CUSTOMER>>:AS<<REMOTEASN>>:<<CONTACT>>"
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> import <<CUSTOMER>>:AS<<REMOTEASN>>
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> import <<POLICYIN>>
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> family inet unicast prefix-limit maximum 20
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> family inet unicast prefix-limit teardown 80
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> family inet unicast prefix-limit teardown idle-timeout forever
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> export <<POLICYOUT>>
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> peer-as <<REMOTEASN>>
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> description "<<DESCRIPTION>>"
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> import <<CUSTOMER>>:AS<<ASNUMBER>>
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> import STD-2828-CUST-IN
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> family inet unicast prefix-limit maximum <<PREFIXLIMIT>> teardown 80 idle-timeout forever
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> export <<EXPORT>>
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<NEIGHBORIP>> peer-as <<ASNUMBER>>
}}

{{set protocols bgp group CUSTOMERS neighbor <<IP ADDRESS>> authentication-key <<AUTHENTICATIONKEY>>
}}
